Detailed Description

this class provide methods for cloudstorage management and cloudStorageAccount information The following example demonstrates how to use the CloudStorageManager class. 

 #include <gaia/cloudstorage/CloudStorageManager.h>
 #include <gaia/base/Vector.h>

 using namespace gaia::cloudstorage;
 using namespace gaia::base;

 CloudStorageManager* pCloudStorageManager = CloudStorageManager::instance();

 // get the num of all register plugins
 int size = pCloudStorageManager->getNumOfSuppCloudStorage();

 // login the first plugin
 int cloudStorage_id = 0;
 pCloudStorageManager->login(cloudStorage_id,context);

 // get login Account info
 Vector<CloudStorageAccount*>* mpCloudStorageAccounts = new Vector<CloudStorageAccount*>();
 mpCloudStorageAccounts = pCloudStorageManager->getCloudStorageAccounts(cloudStorage_id);

 // logout
 pCloudStorageManager->logout(cloudStorage_id);

get CloudStorageFile represent root directory of the account contained in the

Parameters:

Returns:
